long_description: Durable and water-resistant, the Marmot Mavericks 30 Sleeping Bag brings cozy comfort to your 3-season road trips and family campouts. Synthetic SpiraFil high loft insulation and overlapping shingle construction prevent cold spots and work together to keep you comfortable all night. Insulation is a unique blend of large, spiral hollow fibers for loft and small polyester fibers for warmth, softness and compressibility. Tough polyester shell is protected with a durable water repellent finish that causes moisture to bead up and roll off. Polyester taffeta lining; brushed lining in chest and footbox adds warmth and comfort. 2-way, dual side zippers (1 full-zip that extends around footbox, 1 partial-zip) allow top of bag to fold back allowing easy entry. Zipper guard runs the entire length of the draft tube. No more midnight drawcord fumbling-smooth, flat upper cord and hard, round lower cord make top opening adjustments easy. Marmot Mavericks 30 Sleeping Bag comes with a compression stuff sack.
